title: Gemma Collins compares herself to Stanger Things character Eleven
text:
Gemma is a firm believer in the supernatural. (Picture: Backgrid)

Gemma Collins has revealed that she believes she has psychic abilities and has compared herself to Stranger Things character Eleven.

The reality star admitted that she could ‘see and feel things that others didn’t’ when she was younger and added that now she notices that her ‘breasts get heavy on the full moon’.

She’s even spent thousands of pounds on psychic readings over her lifetime.

Who knew she was so into the supernatural?

Speaking in an upcoming episode of her BBC podcast The Gemma Collins Podcast, Gemma let loose about her psychokinetic abilities, saying: ‘When I was younger like I didn’t really understand that I could feel things that maybe other people didn’t or see things that other people didn’t.

‘It’s only when I watched Stranger Things… now I feel like Millie Bobby Brown and I get it.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Addressing the breasts comment, Gemma explained her additional belief that astrology can have an impact on her physical body.

Gemma compared herself to Eleven from Stranger Things (Picture: Netflix)

She once spent £1000 on a psychic after she broke up with an old boyfriend (Picture: PA)

‘I don’t know about you but my breasts get so heavy on a full moon. Literally I can barely move,’ she said.

‘They fill with water. When I looked into this, the moon’s made up of water and that can affect water within.’

And while she was on the subject, the former Towie queen admitted she also believes in aliens.

This is getting deep!

Gemma proceeded to try and address aliens and told them: ‘Aliens if you can hear me please, I’ve got lots of land here where we live.

‘There’s lots of green fields. Land your UFOs where I live, I wanna talk to you, I wanna hug you, I wanna meet you. I’m not scared of aliens.’

So she’s searching a bit further afield for friends than one usually might.

Gemma Collins had a horrendous fall on Dancing on Ice (Picture: Rex Features)

Gemma also confessed that she’s used the supernatural several times in her life.

Once she spent over £1000 seeing a psychic after she broke up with an old boyfriend, hoping they would reignite their romance.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Then following her terrifying fall on Dancing on Ice in February, the star brought in a shaman to hopefully cleanse the ice rink of any more negative vibes.

At least she’s trying to right her wrongs.

description: The GC has likened her supernatural abilities to the Stranger Things character.
